title: Creep Score is higher in game vs post game.
body: I keep noticing that my farm is way more in game than at the end game screen. At first I thought I was wrong, but after keeping track for several days, I see that its sometimes a 30+ cs difference.  Obviously some people don't care, but some of us like to pump up our ranked stats, and CS counts.

replies.body:
I've only noticed this when I jungle but what I notice is the enemy junglers CS doesn't ever seem to be right on the in game scoreboard.

I normally roam through enemy jungle in my games and at 20 minutes when I haven't once seen the enemy blue or red buff up, yet the enemy jungler has a level on me and only 17 cs that something isn't working.

I haven't payed enough attention to it to guess what's causing it. But CS is one thing I judge during game to see how I'm doing versus enemy jungler, and a lot times I'll be behind in level but according to the scoreboard will have an impossibly large cs lead on the enemy jungler almost as if it's ONLY counting jungle minions which sounds silly during a game.

Enemy jungle cs seems to very dramatically in game for me as well.  Out of  vision it will show like 13 cs then when we get vision it will be like 122.  (and no, they didn't afk farm for 100 cs, we had vision of them in between).

Do you have data from the games you had the bug occur in? As in like a list of match histories I could look at to see if there's a common link? I'm having trouble reproducing the bug, any information you can give me will help in that regard x.^

Thanks for the report -- I suspect this has to do with certain units potentially counting as "cs" such as Gangplank barrels or Zyra plants. Will get Game Systems to take a look!

Would it be possible to fix the Gangplank bug? When I play as him i'll buy a cull and have around 96 "cs" but i'll still need an extra 15-20 more farm before i get the 100 for the cull. (I do not take farm from the jungle, so that's not effecting it)
Jungle creeps don't count to CS in your stats for whatever reason.
This is actually intentional. The in-game CS counter includes minions, jungle camps, wards etc. In post-game Minions and jungle camps are split up.

On gp you will notice the cs count missing 100% of the time , at least for me and my friend .
The cs value is instable during game tho, sometimes you have like 170 do a wave ot drops of 30, after minutes and farming you will see the value go up drastically and then later to drop again .
Usually when the value goes up drastically it shows up the true value of cs but you dont know when you will end the match so most of the time you will se the wrong amount at the end of the match because the wrong number stays longer than the real one.
Idk if its only with gp but it sounds as other champ are affected too(presuming that i dont know what the other that encountered this bug have played)
I just played a custom game where I only farmed the jungle camps. It still showed my CS incorrectly in the post game screen.
Yeah I see that constantly, it's a pretty annoying bug. It's hard to tell how ahead or behind in gold you are if the numbers are all incorrect.
